# Data Processing
- Members send data to the Secretariat
    - Catch data submitted officially to secretariat
    - Catch data also submitted via ALK templates
        - Estimate on catches of the current year based on projection. Projection informed by members, TAC and recent practice
        - How is this projected for the current year (Secretariat; check Excel sheet in Teams?)

    - Composition data submitted in ALK templates, both for fisheries as research cruises
        - Manual check on quality / missing variables of the sheets
        - Visualisation of the data in these ALK sheets (https://southpacificrfmo.sharepoint.com/:u:/r/sites/SPRFMOSC9/Shared%20Documents/Jack%20Mackerel/04%20Data/01_readALK_generateRaisedData.R?csf=1&web=1&e=iPa1w7)
        - Linking Length-Frequency data to ALK data [Presentation](https://southpacificrfmo.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/SPRFMOSCJackMackerelWorkingGroup/Shared%20Documents/Data%20Workshop%202021/03%20Presentations/SCW11-03%20Raising%20the%20offshore%20fleet%20data.pptx?d=w28add1b87d224b92b2616fb926e23695&csf=1&web=1&e=oq0BCM) 01_readALK_generateRaisedData.R?csf=1&web=1&e=iPa1w7)
        - Automated workflow reading all historic files, new ALK from Chile to produce updated c@a is almost finished

    - CPUE
        - Each individual fleet does their own standardisation process, details found in the technical annex and WDs
    
    - Research surveys
        - Information from research surveys is submitted via the SURVEY template
        - Manual check on quality / missing variables of the sheets

- These data are stored on the Teams [Data Repo](https://southpacificrfmo.sharepoint.com/:f:/r/sites/SPRFMOSCJackMackerelWorkingGroup/Shared%20Documents/Data%20repository?csf=1&web=1&e=huLIns)
